# cook your dish here
number = int(input())
for i in range(number):
    a = list(input())
    for k in range(len(a)):
        a[k] = eval(a[k])
    print(sum(a))

T=int(input())
while(T!=0):
    t=int(input())
    sum=0
    while(t!=0):
        a=t%10
        sum=sum+a
        t=t//10
    print(sum)
    T-=1

tcases = int(input())
for x in range(0, tcases):
    list = []
    n = int(input())
    sum = 0
    for y in range(0, len(str(n))):
        list.append(n % 10)
        n = n // 10
    for i in list:
        sum = sum + i
    print(sum)

    sum=0

        a=a//10

n = int(input())
suma = []
for i in range (0,n):
    x = input()
    x = list(x)
    a=0
    for i in x:
        a = a + int(i)
    suma.append(a)
for i in suma:
    print(i)

ans = 0
t = int(input())
i = 1
while (i<=t):
    n = int(input())
    ans = 0
    while (n>0):
        ans += n%10
        n = int(n/10)
        if (n>0):
            continue
    i = i+1
    print(ans)

n=int(input())
mylist=[]
while(n>0):
	num=int(input())
	sum=0
	while(num>0):
		rem=num%10
		sum+=rem
		num=num//10
	mylist.append(sum)
	n=n-1
for i in mylist:
	print(i)

# cook your dish here
n=int(input())
a=[]
for i in range (0,n):
    no=int(input())
    a.append(no)
for i in range (0,n):
    s=0
    while (a[i]!=0):
        c=a[i]%10
        s=s+c
        a[i]=a[i]//10
    print(s)

t=int(input())
while(t!=0):
    n=int(input())
    sum=0
    while(n!=0):
      temp=n%10
      sum=sum+temp
      n=n//10
    print(sum)
    t-=1
